column4: I did a search with my ip and this came up first.Maybe it'snot such a big deal. Only... people's loginnames are stored along with there IP's... and for everyone to see.  I think it's not a good idea from anprivacy perspective..
You're probably right, although, anyone can just whois any of us and get the same info, right?
I was just surprised to see my actual loginname appear too.I wasn't expecting to see that to appear in a public log. It's not a good idea to make your loginname publicly available.
